text: Thor Munkager (31 March 1951 in Copenhagen – 4 December 2017http://politiken.dk/sport/art6237881/FCK-og-Br%C3%B8ndby-skal-spille-om- en-tur-til-Haderslev) was a Danish handball player who competed in the 1972 Summer Olympics and in the 1976 Summer Olympics. He played his club handball with Helsingør IF, playing alongside Torben Winther.Fjernstyret af Thor BT Lørdag den 31. januar 2004 In 1972 he was part of the Denmark national handball team which finished thirteenth in the Olympic tournament. He played two matches and scored four goals.Sports-Reference profile Four years later he finished eighth with the Danish team in the 1976 Olympic tournament. He played four matches. He was the assistant coach of the Danish national team under head coach Torben Winther. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Danish male handball players Category:Danish handball coaches Category:Olympic handball players of Denmark Category:Handball players at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Handball players at the 1976 Summer Olympics
title: Thor Munkager
